actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the United States Senate to the family of the late Albert Boutwell, former Mayor of Birmingham, Ala., Lieutenant Governor of the State of Alabama, and 3-term member of the State Senate of Alabama; and paying tribute to him.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the Senate to the family of the late Albert Boutwell, former Mayor of Birmingham, Lieutenant Governor of the State of Alabama and three-term member of the State Senate of Alabama.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the United States Senate to the family of the late Albert Boutwell, former Mayor of Birmingham, Ala., Lieutenant Governor of the State of Alabama, and 3-term member of the State Senate of Alabama; and paying tribute to him.
